page.title: 10THEMES CONTINUED
page.content: Our flight expert for{The Flight } theme was our friend's grandad.He worked on Concorde and helped us to build a model with moving parts like the ailerons and flaps,he also went with us to Exeter Airport.One of our governors told us what Exeter Airport was like during the last war when he worked there.We held an exhibition for everyone to come and see our flight work and I was telling the visitors about the model. Sometimes aeroplanes fly over this area and take photographs,looking down from above.We have some in our class.These made us think about maps.When you look at a map it is as if you are looking down,which brought us on to our{Domesday Survey Project.} We shall follow on from Domesday with a theme called{Adventure Island. We hope to escape from it in a boat.
